title: List of all Android external  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android external  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: android-storage
repoList.description: Create, read, delete, append, encrypt files and more, on internal or external disk spaces with a really simple API

repoList.name: aFileChooser
repoList.description: [DEPRECATED] Android library that provides a file explorer to let users select files on external storage.

repoList.name: AndroidAppUpdateLibrary
repoList.description: Android App Update Library can be used for downloading the Apk from a link , Save it to External or Internal Storage, Than automatic installing the apk. Remember to add provider xml and android runtime permission before using this library. See sample use in app folder.

repoList.name: external-resources
repoList.description: ExternalResources is an Android library which allows you to use resources over the air.

repoList.name: ExternalLogger-Android
repoList.description: External logger library for android applications

repoList.name: android-file-chooser
repoList.description: Android library to provide chooser for files in external storage

repoList.name: android-inputinjector
repoList.description: Android library that enables developers to inject touch and key event sin their own and external apps. Support for Android 2.3 and forward.

repoList.name: JSoup-Android-App
repoList.description: Android app that uses JSoup external Library to parse HTML into DOM and then read that data

repoList.name: ImageWorker
repoList.description: ImageWorker is a Library for Android to Save Images in External Storage
